alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany and southern Platte Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Westview Circle, or 13 miles southwest of Wheatland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Bordeaux, Westview Circle, Y-O Ranch, Chugcreek and Slater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 67 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Laramie Range
